trial_type.Description: Which hand was lifted by the participant in this trial.

response_time.Description: Reaction time to lift the left or right hand after the countdown reached zero.

stim_file.Description: Name of the file that was shown during this trial of the experiment.

value.Description: The code (EEG Marker value) associated with an event

Levels.1: Release of left button (i.e., raising left hand)
Levels.2: Release of right button (i.e., raising right hand)

sample.Description: The sample within the EEG data at which an event occurred

stage.Description: The current stage of the experiment.

Levels.2: Stage 2. BCI was trained on data from stage 1.
Levels.3: Stage 3. BCI was trained on data from stages 1 and 2.

latency.Description: Estimated beginning of the data chunk used for the BCI prediction with respect to the true event as measured by parallel port trigger in this trial.

trial.Description: The current trial within this stage.

bci_prediction.Description: Which lift_side did the BCI predict in this trial.

bci_prediction_valid.Description: Did a prediction arrive on time (if not, a random prediction was made) in this trial.

n_repeated.Description: Number of trials that had to be repeated until the present trial because of invalid participant behavior (within this stage).
